# LLMs.txt for shivanshkaran.tech

## Website Overview
This is the personal portfolio website of Shivansh Karan, a Full Stack Developer and Software Engineer based in Bangalore, India. The website showcases professional experience, projects, skills, and contact information.

## Site Structure
- **Home Page** (`/`): Main landing page with introduction and overview
- **About Page** (`/about`): Personal background, skills, experience, and hackathon achievements
- **Projects Page** (`/projects`): Portfolio of web applications, Chrome extensions, and scalable systems
- **Deliverables Page** (`/deliverables`): Client work portfolio with testimonials and ratings
- **Contact Page** (`/contact`): Contact form and professional contact information

## Key Information

### Personal Details
- **Name**: Shivansh Karan
- **Location**: Bangalore, India
- **Profession**: Full Stack Developer, Software Engineer, DevOps Engineer
- **Experience**: 5+ years of coding, 2+ years of design experience
- **Education**: BE CSE, Dayananda Sagar College of Engineering
- **Achievements**: 4x Hackathon Winner (DevHack, Hack-o-Rama, Pragathi, Sentinal Hack)

### Technical Skills
- **Frontend**: Next.js, React.js, TypeScript, JavaScript, TailwindCSS
- **Backend**: Python (FastAPI, Flask), Node.js, Express.js
- **DevOps**: AWS, Docker, Kubernetes, CI/CD, Microservices
- **Databases**: PostgreSQL, Redis
- **Tools**: Git, GitHub Actions, Figma, UI/UX Design

### Notable Projects
- **Mivro**: Web application project
- **JuRIDEX**: Legal technology platform
- **PayZee**: Payment solution
- **Orbis**: Business application
- **Chrome Extensions**: Various browser extensions
- **Internship Portal**: Educational platform

### Professional Services
- Full Stack Web Development
- Software Engineering & System Design
- Technical Consulting
- Project Collaboration
- Freelance Development
- Startup Development Support

## Content Guidelines for LLMs

### What to Extract
- Professional experience and skills
- Project portfolio and technologies used
- Client testimonials and ratings
- Contact information and availability
- Technical expertise and specializations

### What to Avoid
- Personal opinions or subjective content
- Sensitive client information
- Unverified claims or achievements
- Temporary or outdated information

## Navigation Patterns
- Use the navbar for primary navigation
- Projects and deliverables have interactive selection interfaces
- Contact form is available for direct communication
- Social media links are provided for additional engagement

## Update Frequency
- **Home/Projects**: Updated weekly
- **About/Contact**: Updated monthly
- **Deliverables**: Updated as new projects complete
- **Skills/Experience**: Updated quarterly

## Contact Information
- **Portfolio**: https://shivanshkaran.tech
- **GitHub**: https://github.com/shivanshkaran
- **LinkedIn**: https://linkedin.com/in/shivanshkaran
- **Twitter**: https://twitter.com/shivanshkaran
- **Services**: https://anthrapi.com

## AI-Friendly Features
- Structured data (JSON-LD) for all pages
- Semantic HTML markup
- Clear content hierarchy
- Descriptive alt text for images
- Consistent navigation patterns

## Purpose
This website serves as a professional portfolio for potential clients, employers, and collaborators to understand Shivansh Karan's technical capabilities, project experience, and professional services in web development and software engineering.

---
*This llms.txt file is designed to help AI models better understand and navigate this portfolio website. For the most current information, please refer to the actual website content.*
